name: pkce-client
description: OAuth2 Authorization Code Flow with PKCE from the command line

scripts.pkce: node pkce-client --client_id 0oar16ap61JZJIbYp356 --idp_org https://dev-532307.okta.com --scopes "openid profile email offline_access" --redirect_uri http://localhost:8080/redirect

author: Brian Rafalowski
